Traits.Name: Greenwalker
Traits.Description: All hobs ignore difficult and dangerous terrain.

Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Skirmisher
Traits.Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Protect The Child
Actions.Description: At the start of combat, the Banderhobb marks a foe of its choice, deciding it's a child to be protected. Any time a character deals damage to that character with an action or ability or ends their turn adjacent to that character, the Hob teleports to an adjacent space as an effect, then swipes that character. This effect can only trigger once a turn. Other hobs are shoved 1 and take no damage. Foes and non-hob characters take [D] piercing damage. This mark ends if the Banderhobb's target deals damage to it in any way. If the mark ends, the Banderhobb can choose a new target as an effect action, but can't choose any target it's already chosen this combat.

Actions.Name: Savage Swipes
Actions.Effect: If there's only one valid character, increase damage to 2[D]+fray on hit.

Actions.Name: Bounding Leaps
Actions.Effect: If it lands on a space of terrain height 1 or higher, it can repeat this flight once more.

Actions.Name: Pounce
Actions.Description: The hob flies 4, then an adjacent foe must save or take 2[D] and be shoved 2, or [D] on a successful save.
